sentences.en: a short meeting
sentences.cn: 一个短会

sentences.en: A short time later they sat down to eat.
sentences.cn: 过了一小会儿，他们坐下来吃东西。

sentences.en: after the killing the camp had been shut down in short order.
sentences.cn: 在发生残杀之后，营地马上关闭了。

sentences.en: Food is in short supply all over the country.
sentences.cn: 全国普遍食品供应不足。

sentences.en: For a few short weeks (= they seemed to pass very quickly ) the sun shone and the fields turned gold.
sentences.cn: 短短的几个星期里，阳光照耀，田野变成了一片金黄。

sentences.en: For a short while (= a short time ) , the city functioned as the region’s capital.
sentences.cn: 这座城市曾经在很短的一段时间里是这个地区的首府。

sentences.en: Germany achieved spectacular economic success in a relatively short period of time .
sentences.cn: 德国在相对较短的时间里取得了非凡的经济成就。

sentences.en: He put on a pair of short pants and an undershirt.
sentences.cn: 他穿上了一条短裤和一件汗衫。

sentences.en: he regarded the cost of living as little short of scandalous.
sentences.cn: 在他看来，生活费用几乎是骇人听闻的。

sentences.en: He stopped a hundred yards short of the building.
sentences.cn: 他在离大楼100码处停下了。

sentences.en: he was entering the office when he was brought up short by the sight of John.
sentences.cn: 他正要进办公室，突然见到约翰而止步。

sentences.en: He was short and bald and had a moustache.
sentences.cn: 他个头不高，秃顶，留着八字胡。

sentences.en: He was short and fat, with a large beer belly.
sentences.cn: 他又矮又胖，挺着个大啤酒肚。

sentences.en: He was short of cash after the collapse of his business.
sentences.cn: 在公司倒闭后，他手头缺少现金。

sentences.en: his comments were short and sweet.
sentences.cn: 他的评论很短、很愉悦。

sentences.en: I learned a lot during my short period as a junior reporter.
sentences.cn: 在当初级记者的这段短暂时间里，我学到了许多。

sentences.en: I promise to keep the meeting short and sweet (= short in a way that is good, especially not talking for a long time ) .
sentences.cn: 我保证会议开得简短不拖拉。

sentences.en: I use the short-wave radio to get the latest war news.
sentences.cn: 我用短波收音机收听最新的战事新闻。

sentences.en: I’ve only been in Brisbane a short time .
sentences.cn: 我才来布里斯班不久。

sentences.en: Morris gave a short laugh.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯笑了一声。

sentences.en: People still wore their hair short and dressed conventionally.
sentences.cn: 人们还留着短发、穿着传统服饰。

sentences.en: Seeing her tears, he stopped short.
sentences.cn: 看到她在流泪，他吃惊地停了下来。

sentences.en: She has always had a high reputation for her excellent short stories.
sentences.cn: 她一直因其优秀的短篇小说享有很高的声望。

sentences.en: she's two bricks short of a load.
sentences.cn: 她太笨了。

sentences.en: The guide book contains a short write-up of each hotel.
sentences.cn: 指南上有对每个饭店的简评。

sentences.en: The letter was short — a simple recitation of their problem.
sentences.cn: 信写得很短——只是简单地说了一下他们的问题。

sentences.en: the troubled company has been caught short by price competition in a recession-stricken market.
sentences.cn: 这家麻烦重重的公司由于受到价格竞争，在萧条的市场中处于不利地位。

sentences.en: Their relationship is never short on fun and frolic.
sentences.cn: 他们在一起少不了欢乐和嬉戏。

sentences.en: There was a net outflow of about £50m in short-term capital.
sentences.cn: 短期资金净流出额大约为5,000万英镑。

sentences.en: There was a short sharp shower followed by a strengthening breeze.
sentences.cn: 一场短时强阵雨后风势渐长。

sentences.en: They met and married within a short space of time .
sentences.cn: 他们从相识到结婚时间很短。

sentences.en: we made short work of our huge portions.
sentences.cn: 我们很快吃掉份量很大的食物。

sentences.en: we're so close to getting the job done, but we keep &B{coming up} short.
sentences.cn: 我们就快把工作做完了，但是还是未能达到目标。

sentences.en: Winter is coming and the days are getting shorter.
sentences.cn: 冬天来临，白天变短了。

sentences.en: you won't go short when I die.
sentences.cn: 我死后你不会缺衣少食的。

sentences.en: 未能消除全民警惕，我们什么事都做不了.
